ABOUT_KARROT.EXISTING_GROUPS: 여러 그룹이 이미 Karrot을 사용하고 있습니다

ACTIVITIES.DESCRIPTION: 각 활동에는 그룹 구성원이 등록할 수 있는 여러 개의 슬롯이 있습니다 – 이를 활용하면 모든 사람이 언제 어디로 가는지 알고 이후에 피드백을 제공할 수 있습니다.
ACTIVITIES.SUBTITLE: 모임과 음식 픽업, 커뮤니티 행사, 그리고 그룹에 필요한 모든 활동과 같이 특정 시간과 공간이 필요한 활동들을 소프트웨어에 입력할 수 있습니다.
ACTIVITIES.TITLE: 업무 분배와 활동

COMMUNICATION.DESCRIPTION: 그룹의 모든 사용자가 볼 수 있는 메시지나 개인 메시지를 다른 사용자에게 작성하세요. 활동이나 장소와 관련된 모든 내용은 각 채팅에서 토론할 수 있습니다.
COMMUNICATION.TITLE: 대화하기

DEMOCRATIC.DESCRIPTION: Karrot은 사용자에 의해 만들어집니다: 사용자들의 피드백과 참여로 개발되는 무료 오픈-소스 소프트웨어입니다. 주로 서로 다른 그룹의 사람들과 지속적으로 만나는 소규모 핵심 팀에 의해 개발되며, 이들의 분산되고 수렴되는 니즈를 이해하여 개발을 안내합니다. 저희는 데이터의 무결성과 비상업화의 윤리를 준수합니다.
DEMOCRATIC.TITLE: 민주적이고 참여적인 개발

GROUPS.DESCRIPTION: 하지만 이들은 모두 지도에 표시되므로 사람들은 그들의 위치나 전세계에서 다른 그룹을 찾고 연결할 수 있습니다.
GROUPS.SUBTITLE: Karrot의 모든 그룹은 완전히 독립적이며 이들만의 로고와 프로세스, 규칙, 합의를 가질 수 있습니다.
GROUPS.TITLE: 독립된 그룹들

MAPS.DESCRIPTION: 여러분은 활동중인 장소와 사람들이 표시된 지도를 가지고 있습니다. 또 다가올 활동들의 목록을 가지고 그것들을 온라인으로 등록할 수 있습니다.
MAPS.TITLE: 지도와 목록들

NOTIFICATIONS.DESCRIPTION: 빈 활동과 새 메시지, 그룹에 가입하려는 새 사용자에 대한 알림을 받습니다. 하지만 더 많은 평화를 원한다면 모든 알림을 끌 수도 있습니다!
NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: 알림

OFFERS.DESCRIPTION: 그룹의 모든 사람이 판매를 볼 수 있으며 판매 채팅에서 관심을 나타낼 수 있습니다.
OFFERS.SUBTITLE: 공유하거나 나누어 줄 모든 것의 판매 신청을 생성해보세요.
OFFERS.TITLE: 공유하기

OPENSOURCE.DESCRIPTION: 모든 건 투명하며 변경할 수 있습니다. 각 그룹이 플랫폼의 인스턴스를 호스팅할 수 있는 능력이 있다면 그러시기를 권장합니다. 물론 karot.com의 호스트 버전에 대한 액세스도 여전히 제공할 것입니다.
OPENSOURCE.TITLE: 오픈 소스

TEAM.DESCRIPTION: 여러분은 Karrot의 개발진들과 {forum}이나 {code}, 실시간으로는 {chat}을 통해 쉽게 대화하실 수 있습니다.
TEAM.TITLE: 대응 팀

TRANSLATIONS.DESCRIPTION: Karrot은 커뮤니티에서 완전히 번역이 가능하며 이미 많은 언어가 추가되어 있습니다. 더 많은 번역에 기여하려면 {translations}의 프로젝트를 방문해주세요.
TRANSLATIONS.TITLE: 다양한 언어

TRANSPARENCY.DESCRIPTION: 역사 항목은 누가 언제 무엇을 했는지 보여줍니다. 활동 참여부터 장소의 작성 및 편집까지 모든 항목이 여기에 기록됩니다.
TRANSPARENCY.TITLE: 투명성

TRUST.DESCRIPTION: Karrot 그룹에는 관리자의 강력한 권한이 따로 없습니다. 동료로부터 충분한 신뢰의 당근을 받은 사람은 누구나 그룹 설정을 편집하고 변경할 수 있습니다. 만약에 새로운 사람이 그룹에 참여하고 싶다면 그룹이 정한 질문을 신청하고 답변해야 하며, 편집 권한을 가진 사람이라면 누구나 이를 거부하거나 승인할 수 있습니다. 마찬가지로 갈등이 발생했을 땐 투표 시스템에 들어가 공용의 방법으로 해결할 수도 있습니다.
TRUST.TITLE: 민주적이고 신뢰기반인 그룹 관리

ABOUT_KARROT.SUBTITLE1: Karrot는 서민 주도권과 지역, 자율 및 자발적 기반에서 대면 활동을 조정하고자 하는 사람들의 그룹을 위한 무료 오픈 소스 도구입니다.
ABOUT_KARROT.SUBTITLE2: 그래서 커뮤니티를 구축하고 그룹의 투명하고 민주적이며 참여적인 거버넌스를 지원하는 방식으로 설계되었습니다.
ABOUT_KARROT.TITLE: 그룹을 시작하고, 공동체가 되어보세요
ABOUT_KARROT.VISION_INTRO: 음식을 절약하고 나누기부터, 무료 가게나 공작소를 운영하기, 지역 정원을 가꾸기, 바이크-키친을 운영하기 등...

ACTIVITYDELETE.DELETE_SERIES_TEXT: 정말 이 시리즈를 삭제하시겠습니까? 이 시리즈에 속하는 모든 활동도 함께 삭제됩니다. (사용자가 이미 가입한 곳은 포함되지 않습니다)

ACTIVITYLIST.AVAILABLE: 당신이 선호하는 장소에 하나의 활동이 당신을 기다리고 있습니다! | 당신이 선호하는 장소에 {count}개의 활동이 당신을 기다리고 있습니다!
ACTIVITYLIST.AVAILABLE_FEEDBACK: 피드백을 줄 수 있습니다 | {count}개의 활동이 피드백을 기다리고 있습니다
ACTIVITYLIST.AVAILABLE_FROM_STORES: 다음날 당신이 좋아하는 장소의 활동을 보여줍니다. 사이드바에서 다른 장소에 접근할 수 있습니다.

ITEM.LEAVE_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: 정말 다른 사람들이 당신 없이 수행할 수 있다고 확신하시나요?

ACTIVITYLIST.JOINEDNOTICE: 다가오는 하나의 활동이 존재합니다 | 다가오는 {count}개의 활동이 존재합니다.
ACTIVITYLIST.NONE_HINT: 장소 페이지에서 새 활동을 생성할 수 있습니다.
ACTIVITYLIST.STORE_NONE_HINT: ‘관리 활동’ 페이지에서 새 활동을 생성할 수 있습니다.

ICS_DIALOG.TITLE: 캘린더에 추가하기
ICS_DIALOG.INTRO: Add your activities to your calendar by using one of the following options:
ICS_DIALOG.DOWNLOAD_TEXT: Download the ICS-file to manually import it into your calendar:
ICS_DIALOG.SUBSCRIBE_TEXT: Use this URL to subscribe as an ICS calendar:

ACTIVITYMANAGE.ACTIVITY_DOES_NOT_MATCH: This date doesn't match the recurrence pattern
ACTIVITYMANAGE.TITLE: Manage activities

ACTIVITY_FEEDBACK.AMOUNT: Amount of food you were able to save
ACTIVITY_FEEDBACK.AMOUNT_INFO: For place statistics, we will add together the amount of all feedback.
ACTIVITY_FEEDBACK.COMMENT_PLACEHOLDER: Was everything fine? Did everyone show up? Your comment here...
ACTIVITY_FEEDBACK.TITLE: Feedback
ACTIVITY_FEEDBACK.DISMISS_MESSAGE: Do you really want to dismiss this feedback? You won't be able to give feedback for this activity later on.

ACTIVITY_TYPES.FEEDBACK_YES_HINT: The participants will be asked for feedback about the activity
ACTIVITY_TYPES.NAME: Name
ACTIVITY_TYPES.STANDARD_NAME_HINT: Name will be available in other languages
ACTIVITY_TYPES.CUSTOM_NAME_HINT: Name will be used exactly as you write it and not translated
ACTIVITY_TYPES.CUSTOM_NAME_PROMPT: Type a custom name, or choose a standard name
ACTIVITY_TYPES.STATUS_ACTIVE_HINT: You will be able to create new activities and series of this type
ACTIVITY_TYPES.STATUS_ARCHIVED_HINT: It will not be possible to create new activities or series of this type, but existing ones will still be available

AGREEMENT.BLURB1: You don't have an agreement yet!
AGREEMENT.BLURB2: If you add one then people will have to agree to it before they can do pickups.

REMOVE.MESSAGE: This means anyone will be able to do a pickup
REMOVE.TITLE: Remove agreement?

REPLACE.MESSAGE: Everyone will have to agree again before they can signup for pickups
REPLACE.TITLE: Change agreement?

AGREEMENT.MINOR_EDIT_HELPER: Typos, formatting, etc... people will not be asked to re-agree
AGREEMENT.TITLE: Title
AGREEMENT.TITLE_HELPER: Give your agreement a title, e.g. Community Rules

APPLICATION.ACCEPT_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you sure you want to accept {userName} into this group?
APPLICATION.DECLINE_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you sure you want to decline the application of {userName}?
APPLICATION.GALLERY_TOOLTIP: You applied to join this group. Your application is still pending.
APPLICATION.HELP: This is a chat between all existing members of {groupName} and the new applicant {userName}. It is meant to give you all a chance to get to know you before deciding whether to accept, decline or withdraw the application.
APPLICATION.WALL_NOTICE: There is an application pending! | There are {count} applications pending!

INFO.MESSAGE: This is a score voting in which group members can participate to determine how to deal with a social conflict that affects the whole group.
INFO.TITLE: How does this process work?

REQUIREMENTS.NEWCOMER: Before you can start a conflict resolution process, you need to receive more trust and gain editing permissions. In the meantime, please ask a fellow group member to start the process for you.

CONFLICT.STEPPER1a: You are about to start a group-wide conflict resolution process!
CONFLICT.STEPPER1b: This will involve all members to find the best way to proceed.
CONFLICT.STEPPER2a: Thank you for caring for your community!
CONFLICT.STEPPER2b: It is important to address social issues, although it can be unpleasant sometimes. Thank you for your courage!
CONFLICT.STEPPER3b: This process will start a chat and a vote.
CONFLICT.STEPPER3c: The chat will be visible for members and includes {userName}.
CONFLICT.STEPPER3d: The voting is anonymous. It will go on for {votingDuration} days. During this time all voters can change their minds and vote differently as many times as they want.
CONFLICT.STEPPER4a: Please explain why you are starting this conflict resolution process!
CONFLICT.STEPPER4b: Tell your group what made you think this process is justified and needed. This statement will be visible to {userName} and group members.

VOTING.HEADLINE: How do you want to proceed with the ongoing conflict with {userName}?

CONFLICT.WITH: This process is to resolve a conflict with {userName}

CONVERSATION.CLOSED: This conversation has been closed automatically.
CONVERSATION.NOT_PARTICIPATED: By sending a message, you will be subscribed to notifications about this conversation.
CONVERSATION.UNREAD_MESSAGES: You have one unread message. | You have {count} unread messages.

CREATEACTIVITY.COMMENT_HELPER: What should people know when signing up to this?
CREATEACTIVITY.DIFFERS_WARNING: This value differs from the default. To undo this change, click on the arrow button and save the changes.
CREATEACTIVITY.ENABLE_DISABLE_MESSAGE: Users who joined will get a notification. You can change this text to provide a reason:
CREATEACTIVITY.EXCEPTIONS_MESSAGE: Some upcoming activities don't match the settings of this series. Have a look below at '{upcomingLabel}' to change or disable them, if needed.
CREATEACTIVITY.RRULE_HELPER: Type in a valid {ruleHelper}, e.g. {ruleExample} or {ruleExample2}
CREATEACTIVITY.WEEKDAYS_HELPER: On which days should it take place?

FEEDBACKLIST.NONE_HINT: This page will be filled once more feedback is available
FEEDBACKLIST.NO_DONE_ACTIVITIES_HINT: You currently have nothing to give feedback to. Why not join an activity?
FEEDBACKLIST.SAVED_FOOD: At least 1 kg was saved here. Thank you! | People gave feedback for {amount} kg of saved food already! Keep up the great work!

GLOBAL.INVALID_LINK: Sorry, the link you've opened is invalid.
GLOBAL.NOT_CONNECTED: You aren't connected to the server

GROUP.PICKUPS_TO_ACTIVITIES: You can organise more than just pickups now!
GROUP.PICKUPS_TO_ACTIVITIES_DESCRIPTION: Activities named pickups are still available but we added other types too, like Meetings, Events and Distributions
GROUP.APPLICATION_QUESTIONS: Questions for people who want to join this group

HEADINGS.LOCATION_HINT: If you want your group's location to be made visible on a public map, enter an adress or pick a location on the map below.
HEADINGS.NEW_MEMBERS_SIGNUP_HINT: New members will have to apply and get accepted to your group. You can always change the application and welcome message later in the group settings.

GROUP.INVITATION_ACCEPT_ERROR: Ooops, could not accept the invitation!
GROUP.INVITATION_ACCEPT_SUCCESS: Welcome! You successfully accepted the invitation.

daily_activity_notification.DESCRIPTION: Reminds you of your activities, and tells you about empty or not-full activities of your favorite places in the next day

weekly_summary.DESCRIPTION: Keep up to date with what's been happening in the group.

GROUP.PLAYGROUND_INFO: This is a playground group, you can't break anything. Explore, click around and have fun!
GROUP.SET_LOGO: Click to upload your group logo!

GROUP.WELCOMEMESSAGE_VERBOSE: Welcome message sent to new members

NOTIFICATION_BELLS.CONFLICT_RESOLUTION_CONTINUED_ABOUT_YOU: The conflict resolution process with you continues

OFFER.MARK_AS_ARCHIVED_DESCRIPTION: Mark this is offer as archived to remove it from the available listings.

OFFER.NAME_HELPER: Short name for the item you are offering

OUTDATED_BROWSER.LINK: Please update or switch your browser
OUTDATED_BROWSER.MESSAGE: You are using an unsupported browser. {upgradeBrowser} to enjoy all features.

CHANGE.SUCCESS: Your new password has been saved.

STATISTICS.OPTIONS_MISSED_DESCRIPTION: Only if the activity was missed

STOREEDIT.WEEKS_IN_ADVANCE_WARNING: You are about to reduce the number of activities created. Existing ones will be deleted if nobody has joined them. You can disable others manually, if needed.

UNSUBSCRIBE.FROM_GROUP: Unsubscribe from all email notifications in {groupName}

UPDATE_AVAILABLE.DETAIL: A new version of karrot is available.

URL_COPIED_TOAST: The URL was successfully copied to your clipboard

REVOKE_TRUST.TITLE: Revoke trust

REQUEST_DELETE_ACCOUNT.MESSAGE: Are you sure? Your account and your personal data will be permanently deleted. Anything you have done on this platform will be made anonymous. If you confirm, we send you an e-mail with a link to complete the deletion process.
REQUEST_DELETE_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Account deletion

USERDATA.FIRST_TRUST: Be the first one to trust {userName} in {groupName}!
USERDATA.NEWCOMER_GUIDANCE: {userName} is new to your group and might need some guidance.
USERDATA.NEWCOMER_INFO: You are currently a newcomer in {groupName} and you can become active by writing messages, meeting fellow members, doing activities and giving feedback. As soon as {threshold} members expressed their trust in you, you will gain editing permissions to help with group administration.
USERDATA.OTHER_PEOPLE_TRUST_YOU: {otherUser} trusts you in {groupName}. | {count} people trust you in {groupName}.
USERDATA.PEOPLE_TRUST_USER: You and {otherUser} trust {userName} in {groupName}. | You and {count} other people trust {userName} in {groupName}.

REQUEST_DELETE_ACCOUNT.SUCCESS: We sent you an e-mail with a link to complete the deletion process.

TRUST_INFO.LINK: Click here to find out more.
TRUST_INFO.MESSAGE: It is part of the Karrot trust system. It shows if a group member is newcomer and how much trust is needed until they gain editing permissions.
TRUST_INFO.TITLE: What is this carrot button about?

USERDATA.TRUST_PROGRESS_TEXT_LONG: {trustNeeded} more people need to express their trust in {userName} to grant editing permissions.

VALIDATION.MAXLENGTH: Too long, please use less than {max} characters.
VALIDATION.UNIQUE: Name already exists, please choose another.

VERIFYMAIL.SUCCESS: Your e-mail address was successfully verified!
VERIFYMAIL.TITLE: E-Mail verification

WALL.RECEIVED_VIA_EMAIL: This message was sent via e-mail
WALL.VERIFY_EMAIL_FOR_NOTIFICATIONS: Please verify your e-mail address to receive notification e-mails
